General.Name: AVOD Kurutulmus Gida ve Tarim Urunleri Sanayi Ticaret AS
General.Description: A.V.O.D Kurutulmus Gida ve Tarim Ürünleri Sanayi Ticaret Anonim Sirketi provides dried vegetables and derivatives, and vegetable based convenience foods under the Farmer`s Choice brand name in Turkey. Its products include sun dried tomatoes, oven semi dried tomatoes, sauces and bruschettas, fermented vegetables and grilled products, and grilled vegetables. The company serves hotels, restaurants, and the catering industry, as well as retail chains. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.
